CustomField.formula: "Freq: " & TEXT(Service_Frequency__c) & BR() & "Service Price/Un: " & TEXT(Service_Price_Per_Unit__c) & BR() & "Purchase Price/Un: " & TEXT(Purchase_Price__c) & BR() & "Install Price/Un: " & TEXT(Installation_Price__c) & BR() & "Related Product: " & Related_Product__c & BR() & "Total Price: " & TEXT(Total_Price__c) & BR()
CustomField.label: **More Info
